message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe it would be beneficial for both of us if we could work towards a mutually agreeable price. Considering the value this product holds for you, I propose an initial offer of $950000. I am open to discussing further adjustments based on our negotiations.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value I believe this product holds for me, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1050000. I hope this aligns better with my budget while still reflecting the value I see in the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective and appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle. To continue our discussion, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1000000. This price reflects a compromise between our initial positions, aiming to ensure mutual satisfaction and value creation.
